Light Element is the upper element of the #yEarthy #yElement and the #yFirey Element, which can trigger the effect of both those at the same time.
Dark Element is the upper element of the #yWatery #yElement and the #yWindy Element, which can trigger the effect of both those at the same time.
Earthy Element Card. NL Gain #bBlocks by using it in the #yEarthy #yElement #yState.

Earthy Element Card. NL Gain #bEnergy by using it in the #yWatery #yElement #yState.

Firey Element Card. NL Deal damages to all enemies by using it in the #yWatery #yElement #yState.

Windy Element Card. NL Draw card by using it in the #yWatery #yElement #yState.
For every #b2 #yWatery #yElement #yCards played, draw #b1 card.
